    In conjunction with AutomotiveUI 2023, September 18, Ingolstadt, Germany.

    Call for Participation!

    less than 1 minute read

    We are pleased to announce our workshop taking place in conjunction with the 14th International ACM Conference on Automotive User Interfaces and Interactive Vehicular Applications (AutomotiveUI 2022): A3WS - International Perspective on Inclusive External Human-Machine Interfaces

    In this workshop, we will focus on the accessibility of automated traffic when interacting with vulnerable road user. We look forward to your submissions and lively discussions!

    MOST IMPORTANT FACTS

    • Submission deadline: August 22nd, 2022
    • Submission template: ACM Proceedings Template [sigconf]
    • Submission via EasyChair (link to be announced).
    • Workshop date: September 18th, 2022
    • More info: Participate

    Updated: August 5, 2022
